description:
When you think of PS1 Emulation you probably think of Duckstation but sadly the dev decided to take it from being a GPL project to firstly the Polyform Strict 1.0.0 and then to CC BY-NC-ND 4.0

Arcade1Up:  https://arcade1up.com/
Arcade1Up DuckStation: https://github.com/Arcade1Up/duckstation-sb
Polyform: https://polyformproject.org/licenses/strict/1.0.0/

title: Best PS1 Emulator Just Became Proprietary Software
